about_the_game:
After being banned from heaven, you find yourself in hell. Surrounded by hellish creatures, you must survive hordes of demons and become the new Hell Lord.



  • 50+ cards to make your builds
  • 7+ characters to unlock

short_description: Hellvivors is a survival roguelike inspired by Binding of Isaac and Vampire Survivors. Face hordes of hellish creatures, level up, choose cards and make crazy broken builds to survive this hell.
